sectionText: CI 499 VER is for the students who will teach in classrooms in Verona, Italy for six weeks. The direct goal of this course is to help students work with their co-ops in Verona and have a successful teaching experience. The ultimate goal of this course is to help students deepen their understanding about the culture and its values and beliefs through their teaching practice and to help them develop a new perspective to work successfully with children from different cultures in their own classrooms back home.
